/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. A large tree, lush with green leaves, stands prominently in the center of the image, its branches reaching out towards the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. In the distance, buildings and a body of water can be seen, adding depth to the image. The colors are vibrant, with the green of the tree contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
